医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，屏幕时间与儿童近视显着相关关于儿童和青少年屏幕时间暴露与近视之间关系的流行病学证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Screen-time-significantly-linked-with-myopia-in-children-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Screen-time-significantly-linked-with-myopia-in-children-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50641cff-dd30-4292-a40e-2b1c12ffafc8 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:10:00 -0400 Screen time significantly associated with myopia in children, research shows
人工智能在肿瘤学测验中表现优于同行，但一些错误可能是有害的大语言模型（LLM）在回答医学肿瘤学考试问题时的准确性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/AI-outperforms-peers-in-medical-oncology-quiz-yet-some-mistakes-could-be-harmful.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/AI-outperforms-peers-in-medical-oncology-quiz-yet-some-mistakes-could-be-harmful.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5df28986-2292-41b5-a7c0-5ae105b4f886 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 07:44:00 -0400 AI outperforms peers in medical oncology quiz, yet some mistakes could be harmful
研究发现人体阴茎组织中存在微塑料阴茎组织中微塑料的积累以确定潜在的毒性问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Research-finds-micro Plastics-in- human-penile-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Research-finds-micro Plastics-in- human-penile-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=018d81bd-d16c-45a4-882e-da1a65b84f8f Fri, 21 Jun 2024 06:45:00 -0400 Research finds microplastics in human penile tissue
癌症治疗的新挑战：心血管疾病和环境因素将空气污染与心脏肿瘤联系起来的临床前和流行病学证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/New-challenges-in-cancer-care-cardioangio-disease-and-environmental-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/New-challenges-in-cancer-care-cardioangio-disease-and-environmental-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63c73a8d-4565-4f2b-851b-db4ee4aeeec5 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 06:12:00 -0400 New challenges in cancer care: cardiovascular disease and environmental factors
USPSTF 建议临床医生将 6 岁或以上 BMI 高的儿童和青少年转介至强化行为干预USPSTF 的研究人员讨论了美国青少年和儿童中肥胖率较高的问题，特别是某些族裔群体和低收入家庭的肥胖率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/The-USPSTF-recommend-clinicians-refer-children-and-adolescents-6-years-or-older-with-a-high-BMI-to-强化行为干预.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/The-USPSTF-recommend-clinicians-refer-children-and-adolescents-6-years-or-older-with-a-high-BMI-to-强化行为干预.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106f313c-aed2-488f-b2a3-86bf3ecda3ed Fri, 21 Jun 2024 05:10:00 -0400 The USPSTF recommend clinicians refer children and adolescents 6 years or older with a high BMI to intensive behavioral interventions
俄亥俄州立大学的研究揭示了白细胞在神经纤维再生中的作用在一项新研究中，俄亥俄州立大学的神经科学研究人员发现了一种特殊类型的人类白细胞，它具有再生神经纤维的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Ohio-State-study-unveils-white-blood-cells-role-in-nerve-fibre-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Ohio-State-study-unveils-white-blood-cells-role-in-nerve-fibre-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5a5e749-f2f3-4254-b25c-28e4dab440db Thu, 20 Jun 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Ohio State study unveils white blood cells' role in nerve fiber regeneration
JAK1 抑制和抗 PD1 治疗可增强晚期肺癌的治疗效果根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼学院艾布拉姆森家庭癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项小型临床试验的结果，在抗 PD1 检查点抑制剂免疫疗法中添加抗炎药物作为治疗晚期肺癌的新策略显示出巨大的前景医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/JAK1-inhibition-and-Anti-PD1-therapy-enhance-outcomes-in-advanced-lung-cancer-Adding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/JAK1-inhibition-and-Anti-PD1-therapy-enhance-outcomes-in-advanced-lung-cancer-Adding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ad9bb8a-bb5e-43bb-ba94-2cf34248544a Thu, 20 Jun 2024 23:52:00 -0400 JAK1 inhibition and Anti-PD1 therapy enhance outcomes in advanced lung cancer
GLP-1 激动剂可降低 2 型糖尿病患者的痴呆风险根据瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院在 eClinicalMedicine 杂志上发表的一项新研究，接受 GLP-1 激动剂治疗的 2 型糖尿病患者患痴呆症的风险降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/GLP-1-agonists-linked-to-reduced-dementia-risk-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/GLP-1-agonists-linked-to-reduced-dementia-risk-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da37b67d-7f0a-4203-8b96-fa011d0e9516 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 23:08:00 -0400 GLP-1 agonists linked to reduced dementia risk in type 2 diabetes patients
研究发现接触绿色空间与降低肥胖相关癌症的风险之间存在联系昆士兰大学领导的一项研究发现，接触花园与降低被诊断患有肥胖相关癌症的风险之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Study-finds-link- Between-exposure-to-greenspace-and-lower-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Study-finds-link- Between-exposure-to-greenspace-and-lower-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73febf3e-a9b5-4683-bc6c-065b2557fa14 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 22:58:00 -0400 Study finds link between exposure to greenspace and lower risk of obesity-related cancer
UT健康科学中心授予158万美元拨款用于研究黑人女性的癌症差异一项 158 万美元的赠款将支持田纳西大学 (UT) 健康科学中心护理学院的健康传播学者和西癌症中心和研究所 (WCCRI) 的医学肿瘤学家开展工作，以确定造成根本原因的社会文化和结构因素中南部黑人妇女的癌症健康差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/UT-Health-Science-Center-awarded-24158M-grant-to-study-cancer-disparities-among-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/UT-Health-Science-Center-awarded-24158M-grant-to-study-cancer-disparities-among-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=094d4b8b-5a6d-4b26-9996-8192a4aa4d70 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 22:47:00 -0400 UT Health Science Center awarded $1.58M grant to study cancer disparities among Black women
